DESCRIPTION.ABSTRACT: We manage and execute projects from the initial phases to final delivery (including installations), optimizing time and costs.
DESCRIPTION.OUR_STORY_1: C.M. Service is a company that has been operating for years in the construction sector, carrying out construction and renovation works for civil and industrial buildings, as well as building and installation maintenance for companies.
DESCRIPTION.OUR_STORY_2: It is also specialized in facade refurbishment, fireproof treatments for structures, and seismic retrofitting.
DESCRIPTION.OUR_STORY_3: It carries out the work with the highest standards, continuously and rigorously controlling the innovative materials used, while complying with all current regulations and certifications.
